Description: Normal Attack: Throws things that go boom when they hit things! Perform up to 3 explosive attacks, dealing AoE Pyro DMG.Charged Attack: Consumes a certain amount of Stamina and deals AoE Pyro DMG to opponents after a short casting time.Plunging Attack: Gathering the power of Pyro, Klee plunges towards the ground from mid-air, damaging all opponents in her path. Deals AoE Pyro DMG upon impact with the ground.

Jumpy Dumpty is tons of boom-bang-fun!When thrown, Jumpy Dumpty bounces thrice, igniting and dealing AoE Pyro DMG with every bounce.On the third bounce, the bomb splits into 8 mines. The mines will explode upon contact with opponents, or after a short period of time, dealing AoE Pyro DMG.Starts with 2 charges.
Klee's Blazing Delight! For 10 seconds, summons 5 times 4 Sparks 'n' Splash to attack nearby opponents, dealing AoE Pyro DMG.

When Jumpy Dumpty and Normal Attacks deal DMG, Klee has a 50% chance to obtain an Explosive Spark. This Explosive Spark is consumed by the next Charged Attack, which costs no Stamina and deals 50% increased DMG.
When Klee's Charged Attack results in a CRIT, all party members gain 2 Elemental Energy.
Displays the location of nearby resources unique to Mondstadt on the mini-map.
